steps.name: New User Setup: Free User Sign up
Free user sign up API call
New User Setup: Free User Email Confirmation via Database
New User Setup: Free User Login
Click the Settings on the Side Menu
Click on the button Attach Card
Attach the payment card throw the Stripe service
Fill in the Full Name On Card
Uncheck the Save My Info Checkbox
Verify that the added payment card displayed on the Billing page
